channel.title: ChronicFire [718/742]
channel.description:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/3imGA.png[/img] Hello and welcome to the world of ChronicFire, a wonderful & giant world where you can explore, train 25 amazing skills, fight one of 30+ bosses, make some bank gambling, and so much more. We pride ourselves in our staff members who are not only respectful & fair but are strict when they need to be. All of our staff members have their own special contribution to the community, be it graphics work or web development. ChronicFire updates along with the players, their wants & needs to create not only a helpful but a natural environment.
Forums: [url=Http://ChronicRsps.com/forums]Http://ChronicRsps.com/forums[/url] Webclient: [url=http://ChronicRsps.com/playnow]http://ChronicRsps.com/playnow[/url] Play Now!: [url=http://chronicrsps.com/playnow/option/]http://chronicrsps.com/playnow/option/[/url]
Our Promo Video: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D5e8RswtpTQ&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/T4RfF.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rLdhk.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/O2g9j.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kgL3q.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CO00O.jpg[/img] Working Dom Gloves [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EJPIz.jpg[/img] [b]Active Pking![/b] [i][u]Updated Daily!/u][/i] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7rZg0.jpg[/img]
Vps Speedtest: [URL=http://www.speedtest.net][IMG]http://www.speedtest.net/result/2405102583.png[/img][/URL]
~Andrew
